docstring.long_description:
Requires a CONNECT_MSO2X block to create the connection.

Tested on MSO24.
docstring.short_description: Creates a bus decode for decoding I2C.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_MSO2X block).

parameters.name: clock_threshold
parameters.description: The clock threshold voltage to use.

parameters.name: data_threshold
parameters.description: The data threshold voltage to use.
